message: The Genesee County Sheriff forms a new unit within his department to crack down on human trafficking. It's called the GHOST team. That stands for Genesee Human Oppression Strike Team.

data.description: FLINT, Mich. - The Genesee County Sheriff forms a new unit within his department to crack down on human trafficking. It's called the GHOST team. That stands for Genesee Human Oppression Strike Team. The Sheriff says people in Wayne County who deal in human trafficking have come up to Genesee County....
data.title: New GHOST Team to crack down on Human traffickers
